Entries.default: "That was... harder than I'd remembered."
"What's a metal killing machine doing out here by himself in a cave, anyway? Collecting his thoughts?"
"Whew! Let me... just catch my breath..."
"Luminous adra. It probably connects to the pillar in the arena."
"Hey, it's glowing. Like it splintered right off of Eothas."
"It sure is luminous all right."
"Those belong to the Pr√≠ncipi. The most dangerous pirates in the region."
"Those flags hanging there, you suppose they got something to do with the pirates?"
"Be seeing them flags? Looks like Benweth's up and lifted his leg on this here beach."
"I know the symbol on that flag. It's for pirates."
"I suppose my day's better than I thought."
"That's gonna be hard to clean."
"I'm going to guess there's souls of the recently departed, nearby...?"
"Pirates. They're all over these islands."
"Guess we're not the first to head this way."
"Someone rowed in at high tide, looks like."
"The real shame is the color saturation in those landscapes."
"That art looks about as good as it smells, at this point."
"Not much of a treasure, is it?"
"Sooey! Sooooey!"
"Nah, a working rowboat would've been too easy."
